title: SKIMS
description: As a Senior Flutter Developer on the Skims Flutter app (Android & iOS), I contributed to design, refactoring, and architecture within a 5-developer Flutter team, implementing Clean Architecture with BLoC state management while collaborating on UI, testing, and production deployments.

title: Tech-I
description: As a Flutter Developer on the Tech I app, I was one of two developers handling every aspect—from architecture and design to CI/CD pipelines, debugging, publishing, UI implementation, testing, and production deployments—delivering a robust cross-platform solution.
